mapper.select: /* getEnrollList */ SELECT enroll_id, e.subject_id, e.subject_seq, e.student_id, name, s.subject_title, e.state_cd, complete_hours, e.reg_id, e.reg_dt, e.modi_id, e.modi_dt, e.del_yn, cancel_rs_etc, start_time, end_time, start_day, end_day FROM ENROLL e LEFT OUTER JOIN STUDENT t ON e.student_id = t.student_id LEFT OUTER JOIN OPEN o ON e.subject_id = o.subject_id AND e.subject_seq = o.subject_seq LEFT OUTER JOIN SUBJECT s ON e.subject_id = s.subject_id WHERE NOT (e.del_yn ='Y')
/* getHours */ SELECT complete_hours FROM ENROLL WHERE enroll_id = #{enrollId} AND NOT (e.del_yn ='Y')
/* getCancelList */ SELECT comn_cd, comn_cd_title FROM COMMON_CODE WHERE comn_cd = 'CXL04' OR comn_cd = 'CXL06' OR comn_cd = 'CXL07'
mapper.update: /* updateEnrollCancel */ update enroll set state_cd = 'ERL05' where subject_id IN (select subject_id from open where state_cd = 'OPN07') and subject_seq IN (select subject_seq from open where state_cd = 'OPN07')
mapper.insert: /* addEnroll */ INSERT INTO ENROLL (enroll_id, subject_id, subject_seq, student_id, state_cd, complete_hours, enroll_dt, reg_id, reg_dt, modi_id, modi_dt, del_yn, cancel_rs_cd, cancel_rs_etc) VALUES ('ENRL0' || #{maxEnrollId}, #{subjectId}, #{subjectSeq}, #{studentId}, 'ERL01', 0, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD/HH24MISS') ,'mgr1', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD/HH24MISS'), NULL, NULL, 'N', NULL, NULL)
mapper.select: /*getEnrollDetails*/ SELECT enroll_id, stu.user_id, e.state_cd, complete_hours, e.reg_dt, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(enroll_dt, 1, 8), 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS enroll_dt, e.subject_id, e.subject_seq, sub.subject_title, o.course_id, c.course_title, level_cd, days, hours, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(start_day, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS start_day, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(end_day, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS end_day, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(recruit_start_day, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS recruit_start_day, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(recruit_end_day, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS recruit_end_day, recruit_people, o.state_cd AS open_state_cd, sub.cat_cd AS cat_subject_cd, e.student_id, name, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(birth, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS birth, gender_cd, email, REGEXP_REPLACE(phone, '(.{3})(.+)(.{4})', '\1-\2-\3') AS phone, add_do_cd, add_etc, position_cd, cancel_rs_etc FROM ENROLL e INNER JOIN SUBJECT sub ON e.subject_id = sub.subject_id INNER JOIN STUDENT stu ON e.student_id = stu.student_id LEFT JOIN OPEN o ON e.subject_id = o.subject_id and e.subject_seq = o.subject_seq LEFT JOIN COURSE c ON o.course_id = c.course_id WHERE enroll_id = #{enrollId}
